pages.text: Rumor has it, large animals inhabit $(thing)Savanna$() biomes. These are well known for their love of $(item)Acacia Blossoms$(), ability to carry a $(item)Chest$() worth of items, and decorative ability using $(item)Carpets$().$(br2)Having one at your side seems like a great way to help transport large hauls.
Discover and tame a beast of burden of your own.
